Interface IInputSelectionProvider

All Superinterfaces:
IInputProvider, ISelectionProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractListViewer, AbstractTableViewer, AbstractTreeViewer, AbstractViewer, BinaryCompareViewer, CheckboxTableViewer, CheckboxTreeViewer, ColumnViewer, ComboViewer, CommonViewer, ContainerCheckedTreeViewer, ContentMergeViewer, ContentViewer, DiffTreeViewer, ImageMergeViewer, ListViewer, NullViewer, ProjectionViewer, SimpleTextViewer, SourceViewer, StructureDiffViewer, StructuredViewer, TableViewer, TextConsoleViewer, TextMergeViewer, TextViewer, TreeViewer, Viewer
public interface IInputSelectionProvider extends IInputProvider, ISelectionProvider
Interface common to all objects that provide both an input and a selection.
